title: Deeply Personal: A Journey into Earth's most curious classified ads
description: From the weird to the wholesome, the creepy to the cute, personal ads have it all. Each one is an insight into the private thoughts and desires of the person posting it. In Deeply Personal, Alexis Macaluso brings some of her favorite ads to life with full-color illustrations.A baker with a disturbing secret. An amputee seeking faith-healing. A young, handsy Jack Black. A Viking seeking his Valkyrie. Bigfoot. Aliens. Deeply Personal has it all.Dive into the vibrant and colorful world of Deeply Personal and let the human condition wash over you in all its awkward, desperate, longing, strange glory.
author: Alexis Macaluso
